languages.text: "Как вы посмели ранить беззащитное Дитя, наследие Дома Орселлио? Кем бы вы ни были, за пролитую кровь должно ответить кровью. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "Как вы посмели ранить беззащитное Дитя, наследие Дома Орселлио? Кем бы вы ни были, за пролитую кровь должно ответить кровью. Защищайтесь!"

languages.text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"
languages.original_text: "Как вы посмели ранить беззащитное Дитя, наследие Дома Орселлио? Кем бы вы ни были, за пролитую кровь должно ответить кровью. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Defend yourselves!"
"How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Defend yourselves!"
"How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"
"How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"
"How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

languages.text: “你竟敢伤害手无寸铁的圣子？竟敢伤害奥赛罗家族的子嗣？无论你是谁，你都要为这样的行为付出鲜血的代价！受死吧！”
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢伤害这个手无寸铁的孩子？竟敢伤害奥塞罗家族的子嗣？无论你是谁，你都要为这样的行为付出鲜血的代价！受死吧！”

languages.text: «¿Cómo te atreves a herir a la niña indefensa, a la heredera de la casa Orsellio? Seas quien seas, pagarás esta afrenta en sangre. ¡Prepárate para morir!».
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo te atreves a herir a la niña indefensa, a la heredera de la casa Orsellio? Seas quien seas, pagarás esta afrenta en sangre. ¡Prepárate para morir!».

languages.text: 「よくも無防備な『子ども』を傷つけたな。オーセリオ家の末裔と知ってのことか？誰であろうとも、この罪は血を持って償ってもらおう。死ね！」
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: 「よくも無防備な『子ども』を傷つけたな。オーセリオ家の末裔と知ってのことか？誰であろうとも、この罪は血を持って償ってもらおう。死ね！」

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, das wehrlose Kind zu verletzen, den Spross des Hauses Orsellio? Wer Ihr auch seid, für diese Sünde werdet Ihr mit Blut bezahlen. Macht Euch bereit zu sterben!"
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, das wehrlose Kind zu verletzen, den Spross des Hauses Orsellio? Wer Ihr auch seid, für diese Sünde werdet Ihr mit Blut bezahlen. Macht Euch bereit zu sterben!"

languages.text: « Comment osez-vous porter la main sur l'Enfant sans défense, sur l'héritière de la maison Orsellio ? Qui que vous soyez, vous paierez cette transgression de votre sang ! Préparez-vous à mourir ! »
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment osez-vous porter la main sur l'Enfant sans défense, sur l'héritière de la maison Orsellio ? Qui que vous soyez, vous paierez cette transgression de votre sang ! Préparez-vous à mourir ! »

languages.text: "Savunmasız Çocuk'u, Orsellio Hanesi'nin evladını incitmeye nasıl cüret edersin? Kim olursan ol, bu suçunun cezasını kanla ödeyeceksin. Ölmeye hazırlan!"
languages.original_text: "How dare you injure the defenceless Child, the scion of House Orsellio? Whoever you are, you will pay for this transgression with blood. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Savunmasız Çocuk'u, Orsellio Hanesi'nin evladını incitmeye nasıl cüret edersin? Kim olursan ol, bu suçunun cezasını kanla ödeyeceksin. Ölmeye hazırlan!"
